biotools.summary: Dynamic Proteomics database contains information on the position and amounts of endogenous proteins in individual living human cells. This is based on the Library of Annotated Reporter Cell-clones (LARC). The Dynamic Proteomics interface facilitates searches for genes of interest, downloads of protein fluorescent movies and alignments of dynamics following drug addition.
